text: Terribacillus aidingensis is a Gram-positive, moderately halophilic, rod- shaped and motile bacterium from the genus of Terribacillus which has been isolated from soil from the Ayding Lake in China. ==References== == External links == *Type strain of Terribacillus aidingensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2010
title: Terribacillus aidingensis
